name: Rocky Stretch Gore-Tex Oversocks - Unisex
description: Wear these versatile Gore-Tex® socks over your normal sock system and inside cycling shoes, boots, or light hikers to keep your socks and feet dry. Unlike footwear with built-in Gore-Tex liners, these socks allow you greater flexibility. You can benefit from the waterproofness of Gore-Tex when it’s wet out, and remove the socks to increase breathability in drier conditions. Plus, you can switch them among several pairs of footwear.Made of stretch Gore-Tex for waterproof breathability.Non-stretch sole and backstay for durability.
